weather.question: I fall from the sky, and you need an umbrella! What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I come down in drops.
🌧️ I make puddles.
☔ You need me when you see dark clouds.

weather.question: I am big and bright and keep you warm. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I shine during the day.
🔥 I am very hot.
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.

weather.question: I am cold and white, and I fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ You can make snowballs with me.
⛄ I cover the ground and make it white.
🥶 I am very cold.

weather.question: I blow the trees around, and you can fly a kite with me! What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can make leaves fall from trees.
🌬️ I am air moving quickly.
🪁 I help kites fly high.

weather.question: I'm a big white fluffy thing in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like a sheep sometimes.
☁️ I can block the sun.
💦 I sometimes bring rain.

weather.question: I come after the rain, and I have many colors! What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 You can see me in the sky.
🎨 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo and violet.
✨ I am made of light.

weather.question: I am very loud and bright. I come with a storm. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I flash in the sky.
💥 I can be scary.
⛈️ I come before the thunder.

weather.question: I am a loud noise that follows a flash of light. What am I?

hints.text: 🔊 You can hear me during a storm.
⛈️ I follow the lightning.
👂 I am a booming sound.

weather.question: I am tiny balls of ice that fall from the sky. Ouch!

hints.text: 🧊 I am like frozen rain.
🤕 Sometimes I hurt when I fall.
🌧️ I come from storm clouds.

weather.question: I make it hard to see when I'm around. I'm like a cloud on the ground! What am I?

hints.text: 🌫️ I am thick and white.
👀 You cannot see very far when I'm here.
👻 I can be spooky.

bug.question: I have spots and I can fly. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I have round dots on my back.
🍃 I like to land on leaves.
🐞 My name sounds a bit like a fancy woman.

bug.question: I buzz and make honey. What am I?

hints.text: 🟡 I am usually yellow and black.
🌻 I like to fly around flowers.
🍯 I live in a hive and make something sweet.

bug.question: I crawl in the dirt and carry things. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I am a very small worker.
🧺 I carry things much bigger than myself.
🐜 You might see me marching in a line.

bug.question: I jump very high and am green. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I live in grassy fields.
🎵 I make a chirping sound.
🟢 I'm known for my hopping ability.

bug.question: I float on the wind with colorful wings. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 I start as a caterpillar.
🌈 My wings have lots of colors.
🦋 I used to be in a chrysalis

bug.question: I build a web and catch bugs. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is sticky and round.
🕷️ I have eight legs.
🪰 I eat flies and other insects that get stuck.

bug.question: I glow in the dark. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I light up at night.
🌃 You can often see me in the summer.
💡 I'm also called a lightning bug.

bug.question: I make a lot of noise at night in summer, sing, and live in trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🔊 I have a very loud song.
🌳 I spend a lot of time underground as a baby.
☀️ My song is usually loudest during the hottest months.

bug.question: I roll dung into a ball, and like to live in warm place. What am I?

hints.text: 💩 I roll my food into a ball.
🌍 I am popular in Africa
⚫ I am strong, and very useful in farming.

bug.question: I have a long nose and drink nectar from flowers like a hummingbird. What am I?

hints.text: 🌺 I have a very long mouth part.
🦋 I look and act like a hummingbird, but I am not a bird!
🍃 I fly during the day, and enjoy flowers.
